name: 劉素娥
objective:
本課程的目的是提升工程學生英文技能和幫助他們準備進階工商職場的實用英語需求. 此課程包括英語閱讀、聽力、口語、寫作、理解、語法規則、詞彙的擴大,發音,對話,商務溝通,和專業演講技巧. 課堂主要用英語授課和互動模式。課程材料會利用多種資源:劍橋大學教材、視頻、音訊、簡報,講義、業務報告、報紙文章、雜誌、和英語學習網站.
This course aims to enhance the English language skills for engineering students who are preparing for their career advancement in the industry field or business enterprise. The study includes English reading, listening, speaking, writing, comprehension, grammar rules, vocabulary enlargement, pronunciation, conversation, business communication, and professional presentation skills. Oral English speaking will be primary used in the class with interactive mode. The course materials will utilize multiple resources: Cambridge University textbooks, videos, audios, power point, handouts, business reports, newspaper articles, magazines, and English learning websites.
